title: Where do retail stores such as Anthropologie and Urban Outfitters source their items? Which manufacturers are their products from? - Quora

response.answer_text: Anthropologie, Urban Outfitters, Terrain, BHLDN, Vetri, & Free People are owned by URBN brands. They design & source unique goods for each of their brands. Their suppliers are not public knowledge. You can learn about the Anthropologie buying process by watching the 8 part series Man Shops Globe on the Sundance Channel - - SundanceTV
